root.name: Modern Campaigns: Korea '85
root.description: In 1985 the Cold War turns hot when the Soviet Union invades Western Europe. Modern Campaigns: Korea '85 is an extension of the alternative 1985 war that was covered in previous games (Fulda Gap '85, North German Plain '85, and Danube Front '85). This is the first game in the 1985 series set outside of Europe and depicts an aggressive North Korea that sees an opportunity to invade South Korea while the U.S. is focused on the conflict in Europe.Korea '85 features a number of varied scenarios from small battles to scenarios covering the entire war.
